name: .MCSTRUCTURE
summary: Learn about .MCSTRUCTURE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open an MCSTRUCTURE file in Minecraft Java Edition or Bedrock Edition for Windows and Android. To do so, you must:
Import the resource or behavior pack containing your MCSTRUCTURE file.
In-game, place your structure block and right-click to open the Structure Block menu.
Select Load mode and enter the name of your MCSTRUCTURE file (minus the .mcstructure extension).
